content: Hi everybody! Our team has developed a roulette script using plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript only. This script includes both the wheel and the table.You can see an example of it here: https://yqhlwc.csb.app.We offer three packages:American roulette (wheel & table) - $9European roulette (wheel & table) - $9Both American & European roulette (wheel & table with dynamic roulette type change) - $15We accept cryptocurrencies as payment.If you're interested, please get in touch with us at goldsoftdev@proton.me.
